mapper.select: SELECT COMMENT_NO AS commentNo , REVIEW_NO AS reviewNo , USER_NO AS userNo , CONTENT AS content , CREATE_DATE AS createDate FROM CP_RV_COMMENT c JOIN CP_USER u ON u.USER_NO = c.USER_NO JOIN CP_REVIEW n ON n.REVIEW_NO = c.REVIEW_NO WHERE IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE CP_RV_COMMENT SET IS_ACTIVE = 'N' WHERE COMMENT_NO = #{commentNo}
